name: n8n-nodes-base.sms77
semantic_context: Send SMS and make text-to-speech calls

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Send
options.description: Converts text to voice and calls a given number

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

from.name: from
from.description: The caller ID displayed in the receivers display. Max 16 numeric or 11 alphanumeric characters.
from.ai_hint: The caller ID displayed in the receivers display. Max 16 numeric or 11 alphanumeric characters.

to.name: to
to.description: The number of your recipient(s) separated by comma. Can be regular numbers or contact/groups from seven.
to.ai_hint: The number of your recipient(s) separated by comma. Can be regular numbers or contact/groups from seven.

message.name: message
message.description: The message to send. Max. 1520 characters
message.ai_hint: The message to send. Max. 1520 characters

options.name: options
from
options.description: The caller ID. Please use only verified sender IDs, one of your virtual inbound numbers or one of our shared virtual numbers.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'send' AND resource == 'sms' THEN SHOW parameter 'from'
IF operation == 'send' AND resource IN ["sms", "voice"] THEN SHOW parameter 'to'
IF operation == 'send' AND resource IN ["sms", "voice"] THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF operation == 'send' AND resource == 'sms' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'send' AND resource == 'voice' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
